answers.answer: Hi! Are you from Houston? Well, I just wanted to tell you that my Mom just found out that she has hypothyroidism and she is also on medication for it. However; she found this doctor where she lives that still put her on a weight loss program that includes a low dose of phen and b12 shots, and a high protein low carb diet. She has struggled with her weight for YEARS. She always thought her thyroid was low, but the doctors would always test her and tell her she falls within normal range. Turns out she is severly low. She has since lost 22 pounds. I would suggest trying to find a bariatric doctor who deals with thyroid problems. Alot of them will file with your insurance. If you do not have insurance I know that there are alot of natural remedies and diets that should help you control your weight. I hope you find something that will work for you. If I can do anything to help you please let me know! Don't give up, and be thankful that they found the cancer. God Bless!

Well, i have ENv. illness, chronic fatigue, etc., so some of the same symptoms, & never complained til gained about 30 lb.s..  Well, she put me on synthroid, cont'ed gaining, she said to not worry, Well, diabetes is in my family, so, at 212 lbs., i AM worried. i Just went to a naturopath dr., & she told me, that my pancreas is sluggish, put me on a patch to jump start it, & therefore rev up my metabolism, which is the lowest ever for me. Only my 3rd. day on it, so, can't really tell yet, but, i am very excited about it. & anxious for this to work, at my wits end. Hardly anything fits me any more too. I must add, i come from family of large pple, & started gaining weight at puberty & have battled the bulge ever since. Take care & God bless. Patricia

question: I am on synthroid for hypothyroidism due to thyroid cancer.  Since being diagnosed 8 months ago I have gained a lot of weight and was overweight prior after the birth of my daughter.  I desperately need to lose 50 lbs.  I can not take diet suplements because my synthroid already gives me heart palps.  I exercise daily and watch my caloric intake put it seems I continue to add weight or stay the same.  I can't afford the B12 shot.  What else is out there?  Please help!!
title: Hypothyroid and weight loss (or lack there of)
